product_overview: TakeOpinion is a Django-based comprehensive platform that facilitates medical tourism by connecting patients with doctors, hospitals, treatments worldwide, including appointment booking, accommodation arrangements, and secure payment processing.
core_goals: Enable patients to browse and compare medical treatments globally.
Provide detailed profiles of qualified doctors and accredited hospitals.
Facilitate seamless appointment and treatment booking with integrated video consultation support.
Offer accommodation booking aligned with hospital locations and tiered room options.
Ensure secure and transparent payment processing with multiple gateway integrations.
Support content management via blogs and user feedback for community engagement.
key_features: Extensive Treatment Catalog with pricing and detailed descriptions.
Doctor Directory showcasing medical professionals' specialties and experience.
Network of Accredited Hospitals with comprehensive facility information.
Integrated Booking System for appointments and treatments with Google Meet support.
Accommodation booking system with multiple room tiers and pricing.
Secure Payment Processing supporting Stripe and Razorpay gateways, including a 15% platform discount.
User Management with patient, doctor accounts, and an administrative dashboard.
Content Management featuring blogs, reviews, and a robust search functionality.
user_flow_summary: User registers or logs in to their patient or doctor account.
User browses treatments, doctors, or hospitals using search and filters.
Patient selects a treatment or doctor and schedules an appointment with optional video consultation.
Patient books accommodation associated with the hospital if needed.
User proceeds to payment with transparent pricing and receives a 15% discount on bookings.
User accesses medical reports, consultation records, and manages profile details.
Admins manage platform content, user accounts, and booking operations via dashboard.
validation_criteria: All user authentication flows complete without errors and secure data handling.
Booking system accurately schedules appointments with correct treatment, doctor, and time slots.
Accommodation bookings reflect correct room tiers, pricing, and availability.
Payments are securely processed through Stripe and Razorpay with applied discounts.
Content management features allow creation, editing, and deletion without data loss.
Search functionality returns accurate and relevant results across all entities.
Platform supports concurrent users without performance degradation.
Medical reports and consultation data are accessible only to authorized users.
